description: Node-RED flow examples with data sources and sinks for automation workflows

examples.name: Event to Resource Stream - Downlink Routing
examples.description: Route property updates to a resource stream for downlink commands

examples.name: Topic to Endpoint - Webhook Integration
examples.description: Send MQTT alerts to an HTTP webhook

examples.name: Resource Stream to Topic - Data Broadcasting
examples.description: Broadcast resource stream data to MQTT topic

examples.name: Resource to Endpoint - Analytics Pipeline
examples.description: Send resource changes to analytics endpoint

data_source_types.event: Triggered by device events (device_property_update, device_state_change, etc.)
data_source_types.resource_stream: Triggered when data is sent to a resource stream

sink_types.endpoint_call: Send data to an HTTP endpoint
sink_types.resource_stream: Send data to a device resource stream
sink_types.topic: Publish data to an MQTT topic

notes.split_data: When true, if the source returns an array, each element triggers the sink independently
